title: Post-Vercel deploy: Configure webhook URLs
description:
After Vercel deployment, configure webhook URLs for:

1. **Front** - Create Front App, get webhook secret, configure URL
2. **Stripe** - Create webhook endpoint, get whsec_, configure events
3. **Inngest** - Register app URL in Inngest dashboard, get event key

All three need the production Vercel URL before they can be completed.

CLI Inngest Inspection Commands
description: Implement `skill inngest` command group per docs/support-app-prd/81-cli-inngest-inspect.md. Commands for events, runs, cancel, and signal for HITL debugging.

title: Wire up command group and register
Add CLI pattern hunting commands for Inngest analysis
description:
Add investigation/analysis commands to skill inngest CLI:

1. `skill inngest patterns [--last 24h]` - aggregate events by type, show success/fail/skip rates
2. `skill inngest failures [--last 24h]` - show failed runs with error details
3. `skill inngest event <id> --extract "field1,field2"` - extract specific fields from event/runs
4. `skill inngest analyze` - detect patterns like empty bodies, common classifications

Captures the manual investigation patterns used in debugging session - makes pattern hunting easy for agents and humans.

title: Add `skill front` command set for debugging
description:
Add Front API commands to CLI for agent debugging:

1. `skill front message <id>` - fetch full message (body, author, recipients)
2. `skill front conversation <id>` - fetch conversation details
3. `skill front conversation <id> --messages` - list messages in conversation
4. `skill front inbox <id>` - get inbox info

Uses existing @skillrecordings/front-sdk. Helps debug webhook vs API data discrepancies (like the empty body issue).

title: Implement skill front CLI commands
description: Add Front API commands to CLI for debugging webhooks and API data discrepancies

title: Test front commands and fix any issues
Wire up front commands in CLI index
Bug: Empty message body - Front API 401 error
description:
**Symptom**: Inbound messages have empty body in workflow, causing incorrect classification ("Empty message body" → skipped)

**Evidence**: Message msg_31nagecl in cnv_1jdfa4f9 has full body in Front UI but body='' in Inngest event

**Root Cause**: Front API returns 401 "JSON Web Token error" when workflow tries to fetch full message
- Webhook handler (apps/front/app/api/webhooks/front/route.ts:224) correctly sends body='' with _links for API fetch
- Workflow (packages/core/src/inngest/workflows/handle-inbound-message.ts:70) tries front.getMessage(_links.message)
- API call fails with 401, falls back to empty body from event

**Fix needed**: 
1. Verify FRONT_API_TOKEN is valid in production
2. Check if token expired or wrong format
3. May need to refresh/regenerate token

**Related**: mem-e31347975942a7b7 (hivemind memory)

title: Fix front-sdk schema nullable fields
description:
Multiple fields in front-sdk schemas that can be null from the API are not marked as nullable:
- recipients[]._links.related.contact (see mem-xxx for details)
- Likely others

Causing Zod validation failures when using the SDK. Need to audit schemas against actual API responses and make nullable fields nullable.

title: Regenerate front-sdk types from OpenAPI spec
description:
Front has full OpenAPI spec: https://github.com/frontapp/front-api-specs/blob/main/core-api/core-api.json

Current front-sdk has manually written Zod schemas that are incomplete and don't handle nullable fields properly.

Should:
1. Use openapi-typescript or similar to generate types from spec
2. Generate Zod schemas from OpenAPI spec (or use zod-to-openapi)
3. Ensure all nullable fields are properly typed

Blocks: front CLI commands, any Front API integration reliability

title: Fix front-sdk schemas from OpenAPI spec
description: Fix nullable fields in front-sdk schemas to match Front OpenAPI spec. Current schemas are too strict and cause Zod validation failures.

title: Audit and fix ConversationSchema nullable fields
Test front CLI commands after fixes
